thread.section_title: Hotel du Triangle d'Or - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Elegant, music theme all around
thread.title_full: Elegant, music theme all around - Review of Hotel du Triangle d'Or, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: PhilippeA3
title: Elegant, music theme all around
text:
This is a very nice hotel in the heart of Paris. It would suit a business or a romantic stay.
Music is the theme for all rooms, in all small details like a real drum as bedside table, or the cupboards in a flightcase style, all very original !
Very nice team. Large room for a Parisian hotl, all very clean.
I didn't try the sauna (hammam) or massage but it would be worth a try I am sure.
Didn't eat there either so cannot comment.
all in all, out of the 3 hotels I tried in the adjacent streets, I would chose this one for the atmosphere.
